participant_1.background:
I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young.
I am a single lady who loves chai tea and knitting.
I'm proud of my ability to make the most of Halloween and enjoy it in my own way.
I collect guitar picks and guitar strings to use in my music.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.

participant_2.background:
I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.
i love to cook ethnic foods.
I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself.
I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!
I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.

content.text: Hi! I'm a single lady who loves chai tea and knitting.  How are you?
Hi there! I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.  I also love to cook ethnic foods and enjoy watching cooking videos.

That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read books as well and I enjoy watching Jimmy Fallon.  I'm not very good at cooking, but I love to eat ethnic foods.  I'm also from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.

That's so cool! I've always wanted to visit Scandinavia.  I love to cook and I'm always looking for new recipes to try.  I'm going to a chai tea festival this weekend with my friends.  Have you ever been to one?
I've never been to a chai tea festival, but it sounds like it would be a lot of fun! I love chai tea and I'm always looking for new flavors to try.
Me too!  I love the different flavors and spices that you can find in chai tea.  I'm excited to try some new flavors at the festival.
Me too!  I hope you have a great time at the festival.
Thanks!  I hope you have a great time at the pride parade
